title: Search and State’s Three Limited Editon S2-R Jerseys
content: New York City-based Search and State prides itself in its limited edition prints. This summer, they’re releasing three special edition prints in their beloved S2-R jersey models. The Matrix is a geometric camo pattern, the Galatic is a tie-dye-inspired printed dye design, and the Plasma is a red camo. All are in stock today at 11 AM EST. Head to Search and State to see more.
author: prolly
